name: Silent Spring
description:
As a citizen scientist exploring the floating isles, you must observe the environment, listen to local people and possibly time travel in order to understand the importance of bees in the ecosystem.

ControlsFunctionWASD or Arrow KeysMovementEInteracting with ! pointsQExiting ! interactionsRResetting the level

Sources:

Research:

  • https://www.britannica.com/story/what-would-happen-if-all-the-bees-died
  • https://www.worldbeeday.org/en/about/the-importance-of-bees.html
  • https://www.earthday.org/bees-are-dying-and-its-complicated-but-there-is-one-thing-we-can-do
  • http://honeylove.org/bees/
  • https://www.greenpeace.org/usa/sustainable-agriculture/save-the-bees/
